definition: abbr. for 民主建港協進聯盟|民主建港协进联盟, Democratic alliance for the betterment of Hong Kong (DAB), Hong Kong pro-Beijing party
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: This was fixed by using a dab of high temp silicon.
sentences.chinese: 這是固定使用，民建聯的高溫硅。

sentences.english: The DAB is the largest political party in Legco.
sentences.chinese: 民建聯是立法會內的最大政黨。

sentences.english: No, it is a little dab of nitrous oxide.
sentences.chinese: 這是固定使用，民建聯的高溫硅。

sentences.english: The DAB had said it would oppose the abolition plan.
sentences.chinese: 民建聯原本表示會反對殺局。

sentences.english: Mr Cheng leads the DAB ticket in the Hong Kong Island constituency for next month's poll.
sentences.chinese: 程介南位列民建聯港島區競選名單之首。
